title: A Christian Soldier's Field Manual
description: A compilation of prayerfully selected Bible verses (KJV) arranged by topic. An excellent resource for personal Bible study, group study, sermons and for use in personal or public witnessing. Scores of topics on a variety of common and uncommon themes. Includes a special section devoted to prayers Jesus prayed as well as the prayers of Apostle Paul, King David and other famous Bible prayers. This is a book any Christian would need to "fight the good fight of faith."
author: L. Jan Turner
